sentences.sContent: Joyce’s style of writing was a striking departure from the literary norm.
sentences.sCn: 乔伊斯的写作风格与传统的文学风格大相径庭。

sentences.sContent: ...even cities increasingly become the norm as leaders and business owners begin to wake up to the massive savings that technology can deliver through connected sensors and new forms of automation...

synos.tran: 规范，基准；[经管]定额，分配之工作量

remMethod.val: 本身为词根， 意为“标准”

words.tran: 正常化；标准化；正规化；常态化
常态；[化学] 当量浓度；[化学] 规定浓度
使正常化；使规格化，使标准化

trans.tranOther: the usual or normal situation, way of doing something etc
